mapper.select: select a.id as permission_id, a.domain_id, a.str_flag, a.permission_type, a.enabled, a.description, b.id as api_permission_id, b.title, b.class_name, b.method_name, b.method_params, b.api_path, b.api_exist from permission a left join api_permission b on (a.id = b.permission_id) where a.permission_type=1 and a.domain_id=#{domainId} and b.domain_id=#{domainId}
